org.easybatch.tutorials.advanced.distributed

Class RestEndpointRecordDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.easybatch.core.dispatcher.AbstractRecordDispatcher
      • org.easybatch.tutorials.advanced.distributed.RestEndpointRecordDispatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpHandler, RecordProcessor<Record,Record>

    public class RestEndpointRecordDispatcher
extends AbstractRecordDispatcher
implements com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpHandler
    Record dispatcher listening to incoming rest requests. Each PUT request with a new record will be dispatched to a worker engine. This class is kept simple for demonstration purpose. You should inject a list of JMS queues to dispatch records to instead of calling the static JMSUtil class using a single queue.
    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud@benhassine.fr)
